Uses of World in jade.core
 

Methods in jade.core that return World
 World Actor.world()
          Returns the world on which the Actor resides, or null if the actor is not bound to a World.
 

Methods in jade.core with parameters of type World
 boolean Actor.bound(World world)
          Returns true if the Actor is bound to the given World.
